title: Gerald Kein - Instant and Rapid Inductions in a Professional Pra
description:
Country : USA 
Category : Hypnosis 
Duration : 1:58:01 
Language : English 
Translation : None 


A Dynamic Classic!

Many hypnotists devote too much session time on the induction process. In fact many times late in the day, clients may fall asleep prior to entering the hypnotic state. A good rule of thumb for the practicing hypnotist is, "THE LATER IN THE DAY, THE SHORTER THE INDUCTION SHOULD BE."

In this humorous and highly educational video, you discover many specific instant and rapid inductions and learn step-by-step how to place over 85% of your new clients into deep somnambulistic hypnosis INSTANTLY!

Gain confidence when working with analytic clients and with clients who have failed with other hypnotists! Save valuable transformational session time in the clinical and non-clinical environment!

This workshop will excite and stimulate you to become the very best!
Includes printed (text) Hand Drop Induction!
